title: Systems Dynamics-Based Engineering Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A customized course for corporate training managers to strengthen engineering thinking competencies. The program focuses on developing instructional design capabilities by applying system dynamics models to real workplace cases

learning_goals: Learners can apply an integrated instructional design framework covering cognitive, psychomotor, social, and affective domains using the 4DDD Model.
The interaction between learner development elements can be analyzed using a Causal Loop Diagram (CLD) based on system dynamics.
A comprehensive learning experience design can be performed by applying the 4DDD guidelines to real-world corporate training scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
